name: farewell
fullSentence: Unchosen departures are ritual of becoming who you are.
content:
This is the ritual of a nomadic people living on the grassland.

When the young women of the tribe reached the age for marriage, they had to ride horses and leave the tribe where they had grown up to a new area, to start farming and establish themselves there. The woman was forbidden to see her parents again for the rest of her life.

This is a wedding, but it's also a funeral. The new bride and the departing daughter were both dissolved in the mother's tears.
